name: SpeechSynthesis.speak
description: The speak() method of the SpeechSynthesis interface adds an utterance to the utterance queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The speak() method of the SpeechSynthesis interface adds an utterance to the utterance queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.
